metadata.title: CVE-2019-6462 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an infinite loop in the function _arc_error_normalized in the file cairo-arc.c, related to _arc_max_angle_for_tolerance_normalized.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-11-26, no upstream fix rodrigo-zaiden> upstream merged a commit on Aug/2021 and closed the issue on Dec/2021.

criterions.comment: cairo package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
